message: Here's another good idea to view if you ever thought merging project files (e.g. .csproj files) can be quite silly at times
story: Meligy shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Organize project XML files to reduce 3-way merge conflicts
caption: visualstudio.uservoice.com
description: If the project XML file contents were simply ordered, for instance alphabetically like a default file system view, it would drastically reduce the number of merge conflicts that edits cause. Currently we see items added at the same spot in the file (so there is SOME order happening) with no relation...
